rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0001
rows.name:
It's regrettable. Even defeating Growth
won't bring back what was lost.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0002
rows.name: As the old saying goes, "no use crying over spilled milk".[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0003
rows.name:
Why did those aliens hate
Earthlings so much?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0004
rows.name:
I don't know how they got to this planet,
but I'm certain of one thing now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0005
rows.name: [ST:undisp ][ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Who the ones who dragged Earth
into the war were.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0007
rows.name: No way!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0008
rows.name:
Even if it wasn't all of them, they're definitely
one faction of the aliens who attacked Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0009
rows.name: That Doll-like mech we just saw—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0010
rows.name:
should match what's recorded
in the NLA database.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0011
rows.name: How could[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0012
rows.name:
Even though it turned out this way,
I appreciate your cooperation, Lu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0013
rows.name: Not at all. I apologize I couldn't do more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0014
rows.name:
I wish I could offer some thanks,
but unfortunately, given the situation...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0015
rows.name: Thanks...?[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0015_2
rows.name: I know![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0016
rows.name: Could you take me to your city?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0017
rows.name:
To our city?
Can I ask why, exactly?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0018
rows.name: The Database Unit was destroyed,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0019
rows.name:
the means to satisfy my curiosity
have disappeared.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0020
rows.name: However, if there's an alien city, that's another matter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0021
rows.name: Unknown intellectual experiences await there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0022
rows.name: Consider that my thanks![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0023
rows.name: Weird alien.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0024
rows.name: What do you think of Lu's proposal?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_JNK0010
rows.name: Trust

rows.label: xs04110100_SEL0011
rows.name: Smile, thinking it seems like fun.

rows.label: xs04110100_JNK0020
rows.name: Distrust

rows.label: xs04110100_SEL0021
rows.name: Suggest Lu might be Growth.

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0025
rows.name: Right. We're different from Growth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0026
rows.name:
We want to get along
with the natives of this planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0027
rows.name:
Really? I can't imagine Lu-san is Growth,
though[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0028
rows.name:
Sure, his face is a bit scary, and he talks funny,
but I don't think he's a bad guy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0030
rows.name:
Lin-san is right, meh!
There are no bad natives, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0031
rows.name:
You lose.
Besides, we're different from Growth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0032
rows.name:
We want to get along
with the natives of this planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0033
rows.name:
Settled then. Okay, let's go right away.
As the old saying goes, "strike while the iron is hot!"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0034
rows.name:
There's also the matter of Lu.
Let's return to NLA and report to Commander Vandham.[ST:wait ]
